Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Our organization was founded in 2015 and focuses on artificial intelligence and big data analytics. We are currently working on a scientific research project on climate change that requires the storage of large amounts of meteorological data.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: The meteorological data we plan to store includes historical records of global temperature, precipitation, wind speed, etc., which will be used to build and validate climate models.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: During data preparation, we used the go-graphsplit tool recommended in the Droplet documentation to efficiently shard the dataset. This tool has been extensively verified by the Filecoin community and can ensure that data remains efficient and complete during storage and retrieval, while meeting the technical requirements of the Filecoin network.
